name: Minimal Workspace
description: Are you bored of aesthetic Notion templates or find it hard to concentrate on your work due to a lot of unnecessary stuff? This Notion template is for you. It is a minimal workspace to get most of the work done so that you do not feel overwhelmed with so much work and complete every task on time. It is an easy-to-use, minimal dashboard. FAQsWho am I?
